short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find recipes based on the ingredients you have.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
I don't know about any of you but the amount of times I've had a random assortment of ingredients and no idea what to make with them has gotten out of hand!

This is a simple extension in which you enter whatever ingredients you have, and it searches Google for recipes including, at a minimum, the ingredients you entered. It displays the results by the highest rated recipes first.

Thanks!
Louis :)
